section.45: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: Abu Musa reported that when any needy (person) came to Allah's Messenger (ï·º) with a need he commanded him to his Companions, saying:Make a recommendation for him, and you would get the reward. Allah, however, gives the verdict through the tongue of His Apostle what He likes most
